term.title: passive sampler

item.text: A device for preconcentration of trace substances from gaseous media based on molecular diffusion without controlled conveyance of the gas to be investigated (e.g. work place air).

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2205 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
